name: Commercial Tech Plus
content: Commercial Technologies Plus is one of the elite companies in Sri Lanka whose ventures span across customized enterprise solution system fields such as cloud mobility enterprise, augmented reality & virtual reality, web development.

name: LYKEN TECHNOLOGIES
content: Lyken specializes in Artificial Intelligence, Robotic Process Automation, Data Analytics, Digital Marketing and A.I Chatbots. Lyken is launching its very own E-Commerce platform to enable Made in Sri Lanka products to be sold world-wide.

name: CyberLabs (PVT) LTD
content: Helps businesses secure their infrastructure, applications and data in the digital space.

name: Marx
adr: Level 37 West Tower, World Trade Center , Colombo 01
content: There is more to money than knowing how to earn it. Similarly thereâ€™s more to your life than paying bills. Marx is the first and only App in Sri Lanka to give you total control over your earnings, savings, whilst growing and spending your money.

name: SpectraSenz
content: We make IoT solutions that enable Security and conveniences to our Customers. Our first product is a 100% locally engineered Device and app to Automate the Roller gates.
